entry.title: Re @WallStreetSilv Macron is doing the difficult, but right thing. The retirement age of 62 was set when lifespans were much shorter. It is impossible...
entry.summary: Re @WallStreetSilv Macron is doing the difficult, but right thing. The retirement age of 62 was set when lifespans were much shorter. It is impossible for a small number of workers to support a massive number of retirees.
